mapper.select: select * from (select ROWNUM rnum, aa.* from (select * from LOSTITEMS order by LONO desc) aa) where rnum>#{startRow} and rnum<=#{endRow}
mapper.update: update LOSTITEM set LOUID=#{louid}, LOCNAME=#{locname}, LOSUB=#{losub}, LOCON=#{locon} where LONO=#{lono}
mapper.select: select * from LOSTITEMS where LOSUB like '%'||#{losub}||'%' order by lono desc
select * from LOSTITEMS where LOSUB like '%'||#{query}||'%' order by lono desc
